run_command.title: Run Command
run_command.description: Triggers a slash command or a list of slash commands.
run_command.deprecationMessage: This event will be deprecated in 1.21.20 in favor of custom components

anyOf.description: List of slash commands to run.

target.title: Target
target.description: The target context to execute against.
